marklogic.body: THANK GOD ! I really considered dropping ubuntu on all my clients machines that I manage and have installed 10.04 for them with the promise of years long stability. As Unity loomed along with no alternatives I really started panicking, because the reliable OS that 10.0.4 is suddenly seemed to have turned into a nightmare with the releases after.Â Unity would be not only a shock but in professional areas simply make ubuntu unusable, especially for graphic designers and photographers .Â Â At home Unity and its one window UI is ok, fun and might be your taste , even I do not completely despise it - but ubuntu is used in situations where a lot of open windows and accesible menus are simply a must have standard. So Glad to hear this, it takes my Headaches away and lets me look forward again ;-)
